column4: any ideas why 10.04 startup would stay in the "four dots" mode at startup? i think it's at "checking battery state". top shows nothing interesting (or i don't see it), ps xaf's not very helpful..
i left the distribution upgrade thing running and my laptop was in a hibernate mode of some sort when i got back. i had to reboot it and now it's stuck in that four dots screen
i also tried booting an earlier kernel
i had a problem like that, but i reinstalled instead of working the problem :-/
